HEADING: Webhooks
INTRO_TEXT: FastComments supports webhooks for Comments. All payloads are signed with an HMAC signature. Below you can configure webhooks globally or for specific domains.
DOCUMENTATION_LINK_TEXT: For documentation and the request structure, see here.
NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: JavaScript is required for this UI to function properly.
RECENT_FAILURES_MESSAGE: You have recent webhook failures. Try checking the logs.
STATUS_NOT_VERIFIED_EXPECTED_200: ❌ Not verified. Expected status code of 200.
STATUS_NOT_VERIFIED_EXPECTED_401: ❌ Not verified. Expected status code of 401 when API key is invalid.
CONFIRM_SET_READY: This will manually set the webhook status as Ready, bypassing the API Key validation. Continue?
